description: This PHP source file implements a web page for changing user passwords within a troubleshooting section, including client-side validation, show/hide password feature, and server communication for saving new passwords.

methods.name: getInstanceNum
methods.description: Determines the user instance number based on session username.

methods.name: cancel_save
methods.description: Redirects the user to at_a_glance.php when cancel button is clicked.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends an AJAX request to save the new password configuration and handles success or failure responses.

methods.name: next_step
methods.description: Validates input fields and initiates password change by calling set_config.
